body: this kind of doujin that I always hope nhentai have separate favorite list.. the fapable and the "I can't read this cause this is wholesome"
I think it would be better if the fmc's mom is just mc's childhood crush, instead of sister. Not complaining on the story though, just saying that it isnt necessary for the mom to be his sister

@itsuka_hiori No they aren't. The sister was telling MC that she would pay for her daughter's staying over. She jokingly compared that to "hotel fees" and MC replied "at weekend's rate" (hotels are more expensive in the weekend).
If anyone noticed in page 5 MC and his sister also had sex XD
